item.title: Lynne add a quote by Benjamin Franklin
item.description: "Either write something worth reading or do something worth writing." -- Benjamin Franklin

item.title: Lynne add a quote by Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
item.description: "Whatever you can do or dream you can, begin it. Boldness has genius, power and magic in it!" -- Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

item.title: Lynne add a quote by Vincent Van Gogh
item.description: "There is nothing more truly artistic than to love people." -- Vincent Van Gogh

item.title: Lynne add a quote by Orson Scott Card
item.description: "It's called civilization. Women invented it, and every time you men blow it all to bits, we just invent it again." -- Orson Scott Card

item.title: Lynne add a quote by Orson Scott Card
item.description: "Early to bed and early to rise," Mazer intoned, "makes a man stupid and blind in the eyes." -- Orson Scott Card

item.title: Lynne add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Keep away from people who try to belittle your ambitions. Small people always do that, but the really great make you feel that you, too, can become great." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Lynne add a quote by James Lane Allen (1849-1923) American novelist
item.description: "We do not attract what we want, But what we are." -- James Lane Allen (1849-1923) American novelist

item.title: Lynne add a quote by Alphonse Karr
item.description: "Some people grumble that roses have thorns; I am grateful that thorns have roses." -- Alphonse Karr

item.title: Lynne add a quote by Eugene Benge
Lynne add a quote by Denis Waitley
item.description: "Failure should be our teacher, not our undertaker. Failure is delay, not defeat. It is a temporary detour, not a dead end. Failure is something we can avoid only by saying nothing, doing nothing, and being nothing." -- Denis Waitley

item.title: Lynne add a quote by Orson Scott Card
item.description: "If you try and lose then it isn't your fault. But if you don't try and we lose, then it's all your fault." -- Orson Scott Card

item.title: Lynne add a quote by Bob Anderson
item.description: "There is nothing so rewarding as to make people realize that they are worthwhile in this world." -- Bob Anderson
